CODE COMPARATIVE TABLE - ORDINANCES
This table gives the location within this Code of those ordinances adopted since the 1965 Code, which are included herein. Ordinances adopted prior to such date were incorporated into the 1965 Code. Ordinances not listed herein have been omitted as repealed, superseded or not of a general and permanent nature.
EXPAND

Date Section Section
